::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus: Medical room...? I'll be there soon.

Rodimus tracks the signal and transformes, driving at top speed. He arrives soon after, transforming back to bot mode.

Rodimus hugs and takes his daughter into his arms, picking her up.(If thats ok.)

Rodimus: Kup, it's good to see you but what has happened? My wife?

::Kup::

Kup: CR chamber, lad. She'll be ok. She was hurt saving Windlord and myself from a Decepticon. We really need to talk. Any high ranking officials should be there. A lot has changed on a galactic level recently.

Rodimus thinks things over and opens a comm channel on the local Maximal channels.

Rodimus: Rodimus Prime to Perseus and all other Maximal officers. I request an emergency briefing ASAP. An old friend has come with information.
